casebody.data:
Janell GOFFE, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
FOULKE MANAGEMENT CORP. t/a Cherry Hill Triplex/Cherry Hill Mitsubishi and Antonio (Tony) Salisbury, Defendants-Petitioners. Sasha Robinson and Tijuana Johnson, Plaintiffs,
v.
Mall Chevrolet, Inc., Defendant. C-71 September Term 2018
081258 Supreme Court of New Jersey. September 28, 2018

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-2658/2659-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted.
